channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft Corporation -- Microsoft Exchange Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft Corporation -- Microsoft Exchange Server

item.title: CVE-2017-11761|2024-09-17T03:02:51.278Z -- microsoft%20corporation -- microsoft%20exchange%20server
item.description: Microsoft Exchange Server 2013 and Microsoft Exchange Server 2016 allow an input sanitization issue with Microsoft Exchange that could potentially result in unintended Information Disclosure, aka "Microsoft Exchange Information Disclosure Vulnerability"

item.title: CVE-2017-11932|2024-09-17T04:29:17.714Z -- microsoft%20corporation -- microsoft%20exchange%20server
item.description: Microsoft Exchange Server 2016 CU5 and Microsoft Exchange Server 2016 CU5 allow a spoofing vulnerability due to the way Outlook Web Access (OWA) validates web requests, aka "Microsoft Exchange Spoofing Vulnerability".
